review-date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2025
review-text: I ordered this phone back in February & back when I opened it, it felt brand new. The battery still lasts super long & charges quickly with my fast charger from Anker. It had a couple of scuffs on the back, but it's barely noticeable. Especially with a case, which I always keep it in. It does feel comfortable to hold without a case, but I prefer having a case for popsockets. The phone functions perfectly, I was surprised for a refurbished one. The speakers sound how they should (my cousin got the same model but brand new so I was able to test) even with a privacy screen protector on, the finger print reader works as well as the face ID. I definitely can see myself having this phone for years. I play genshin impact & honkai star rail on it and they both run superrr smooth. I also used to play infinity nikki on it and that ran pretty well too. But these games do drain the battery quite a bit (obviously). It really does feel like a pc in phone form. I have successfully connected my phone to monitors, but i havent done much with that feature. (Samsung dex or something like that) (I took these pics with my iPad so forgive the quality, the phone looks more deep purple irl. But the phone arrived with these scuffs. And here's proof of the battery charging fast & how long it lasts!)

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2025
review-text: Had the Google Pixel 10 Pro XL but returned it mostly because of the screen clarity was not as clear and vibrant as my older Z Fold 3 which despite being 4 years old was much more legible. The S24 Ultra screen clarity is outstanding and the adaptive display brightness level along with the anti reflective coating whipped the direct sunlight over the Pixel every day of the week. With the Google Pixel 10 Pro XL other than a few notification features that I'm currently tweaking with on the S24 it beats the Google Pixel. This unit from the seller has only extreme minute flaws that warrant the price I paid and I am very responsible with items and concerned about condition and maintenance. The battery on this phone with heavy use has been lasting over a day and I have almost 275 apps on the phone with the maximum dpi setting. I can't assure you that you get an outstanding phone but can vouch for my item. Spen works as it should. Good item that is like new.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2025
review-text: Absolutely wonderful phone. Perfect condition with 98% battery. Once I installed my Sim it updated to UI 8.0 and everything is great. For anyone who doesn't know you must add your carrier before they will update. Highly recommend this phone!

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2025
review-text: So far so good. I took a gamble with it as it's my first refurbished phone but I must say I can't tell the difference! The phone has been working well, no lag, great camera quality. I've been rather pleased. No issues onboarding and no scratches at least that I can rmbr, the phone stays in a case anyway

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2025
review-text: I must say, I had my doubt buying it. But I love everything about it, it's perfect like new. Everyone says it new, that's how good it is and I also feel like it's new cause everything works perfectly and had no scratches or any damage. Camera is amazing as well. I'm obsessed, I love my phone!

span: I orderrd the Refurbished - Excellent condition
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2025
review-text: Been using the phone for a week now and it works very well, battery holds up pretty great too as ive been on it ALOT and i charge maybe once a day, maybe not at all for the day. The appearance of the phone, though it said refurbished, it was like brand new, no scratches or cracks, there were a few fingerprint marks on the back but a simple dab of a dry cloth fixed that. The phone is fully unlocked, I tried 3 Sim cards from 3 different networks in it and they all worked well. May come back to give a 1 month update but so far, it's been great.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2026
review-text: Just received my phone a couple of hrs ago, got it all set up and so far so good, I'll further review after a week of use

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2026
Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2025
review-text: I was initially hesitant to purchase a refurbished phone, but it has worked out far better than expected. After 2–3 months of use, I’ve had no issues at all. I’ve since placed it in a case, and it has been performing great. The screen is definitely scratch-resistant, which I appreciate. Battery life has also been solid. I don’t live on my phone since I mainly use it for work, but it still holds a charge well throughout the day. The only unexpected part was the color—it arrived more muted than I anticipated. Thankfully, the case I’m using adds more vibrance, so I actually feel excited to pick it up now. The stylus and notes experience is the best I’ve had on any device. My only wish is that the pen felt a bit sturdier. Aside from that, no complaints. The phone arrived fully unlocked and ready to use. Overall, I’m very satisfied with this purchase.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2026
review-text: A year later and this still works perfectly. I recommend buying from this seller. I know there's a lot of mixed opinions when it comes to buying refurbished, but this is one of the good ones.
